articles.description: Muthoot Pappachan Group-backed Muthoot Microfin got listed at a discount of over 5% as against an offer price of ₹291. Analysts expected the issue to list at a premium of around 10% owing to the company's strong brand recall and synergies with Muthoot Pappach…

articles.author: Tushar Goenka
articles.title: From GoMechanic to ZestMoney: Why thousands of startups shut shop in 2023 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: While companies such as Zestmoney and Striker saw their business models fail after a tighter regulatory landscape, several others simply couldn’t find their product market fit (PMF).
articles.content: Investors tightened their purse strings and began cherry picking the startups they funded in 2023. The result? Thousands of companies, who solely depended on venture capital for their survival, had t… [+5391 chars]
